attributes.action: stop the proposal for mineral extraction at Bridgham and Harling Norfolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Minerals and Waste local plans have identified Manor Farm Bridgham (adjacent to residential properties of eastern Bridgham) and a large area of Forestry Commission Land at West Harling. Bridgham is the only proposed site in Norfolk to be so close to a village centre.This is an extention to the original petition signed by 934 others (please do not sign twice).
